VNS_desc: Tenderness refers to gentleness and softness. In data stories, typical topics concerning tenderness include mental health, the beauty of nature, and social welfare. The most common patterns of tenderness in animation include the use of a slow speed and the imitation of natural phenomena.

Excitement is an energetic state when people feel very enthusiastic and eager. Data stories that aim to boost optimism or raise passion usually adopt an exciting tone. Relevant topics include economic development, social progress, sports, or games. In general, excitement requires fast and forceful motion.
